headline: Workday Acquires Flowise, Bringing Powerful AI Agent Builder Capabilities to the Workday Platform
summary: Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ: WDAY), the AI platform for managing people, money, and agents, today announced it has acquired Flowise, a low-code platform that makes it easy to build AI agents—from simple chatbots to complex automated workflows. This acquisition provides Workday with an industry-leading agent builder that will accelerate innovation across its platform and empower customers and partners to safely design, launch, and manage AI agents with greater speed, flexibility, and confidence.

headline: Cloud Computing Market Surges to $2,281.1 billion by 2030 - Dominated by Microsoft (US), Google (US), IBM (US)
summary: Delray Beach, FL, Aug. 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- According to MarketsandMarkets™, the global Cloud Computing Market is projected to grow from USD 1,294.9 billion in 2025 to USD 2,281.1 billion by 2030, at a CAGR of 12.0% during the forecast period. headline: Lifeward (LFWD) Reports Q2 Loss, Lags Revenue Estimates
summary: Lifeward (LFWD) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -132.00% and -11.53%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: O'Reilly Achieves Workday Certified Integration and Joins the Workday Marketplace to Support Workforces in Building Critical Tech and Business Skills
summary: BOSTON, August 14, 2025--O'Reilly Media, Inc., a premier learning platform for technology professionals, today announced that it has achieved Workday Certified Integration status. O’Reilly provides its customers with a seamless integration that connects Workday Learning with the O’Reilly learning platform.

headline: 3 S&P 500 Stocks We Find Risky
summary: While the S&P 500 (^GSPC) includes industry leaders, not every stock in the index is a winner. Some companies are past their prime, weighed down by poor execution, weak financials, or structural headwinds.
